# new MB flux, antinumu mode, muon antineutrino flux, the main component
beam_type=0
beam_energy = 0 7600 2.157e-12 7.84e-12 9.731e-12 1.141e-11 1.319e-11 1.438e-11 1.477e-11 1.479e-11 1.5e-11 1.485e-11 1.447e-11 1.406e-11 1.345e-11 1.287e-11 1.221e-11 1.152e-11 1.075e-11 9.98e-12 9.177e-12 8.411e-12 7.658e-12 6.907e-12 6.18e-12 5.505e-12 4.877e-12 4.269e-12 3.686e-12 3.151e-12 2.678e-12 2.262e-12 1.898e-12 1.58e-12 1.311e-12 1.083e-12 8.917e-13 7.285e-13 5.941e-13 4.834e-13 3.937e-13 3.18e-13 2.577e-13 2.066e-13 1.665e-13 1.346e-13 1.081e-13 8.837e-14 7.136e-14 5.707e-14 4.62e-14 3.778e-14 3.028e-14 2.412e-14 1.977e-14 1.638e-14 1.323e-14 1.038e-14 8.707e-15 6.981e-15 6.078e-15 5.111e-15 3.919e-15 3.328e-15 2.861e-15 2.382e-15 2.295e-15 2.269e-15 1.828e-15 1.613e-15 1.537e-15 1.375e-15 1.247e-15 1.044e-15 9.532e-16 8.148e-16 7.485e-16 7.837e-16 6.202e-16 6.614e-16 5.495e-16 5.132e-16 4.9e-16 4.984e-16 4.479e-16 2.406e-16 2.196e-16 1.973e-16 1.762e-16 1.339e-16 1.256e-16 9.669e-17 7.546e-17 5.98e-17 6.291e-17 4.74e-17 3.581e-17 3.289e-17 2.808e-17 2.706e-17 2.439e-17 1.477e-17 1.24e-17 1.035e-17 9.001e-18 6.87e-18 8.575e-18 4.392e-18 4.736e-18 3.038e-18 2.413e-18 2.072e-18 2.061e-18 1.113e-18 9.256e-19 6.533e-19 8.079e-19 6.662e-19 3.475e-19 3.808e-19 3.495e-19 2.521e-19 1.967e-19 1.264e-19 6.892e-20 7.387e-20 3.467e-20 1.026e-19 1.603e-20 1.62e-20 1.13e-20 1.395e-20 2.114e-21 3.943e-21 1.888e-21 6.712e-21 5.944e-21 0 1.436e-21 0 0 0 0 0 0 1.436e-21 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 
# the PDG code of the beam particle
# 12 - nu_e    
# 14 - nu_mu
# 16 - nu_tau
# -12 - anti_nu_e
# -14 - anti_nu_mu
# -16 - anti_nu_tau

beam_particle      = -14

# The direction of the beam given as a 3 coordinates of the vector alligned with the beam

beam_direction     = 0 0 1
